question: What is the function of Pro-Tem Speaker?
option2: Check if the election certificates of the members are in order
option3: Conduct proceeding of the House in absence of the Speaker
explanation: The senior most member of the Lok Sabha is appointed as the Pro-Tem Speaker as soon as the new government is formed. He administers the oath to newly elected members of the House and conducts proceeding till a regular Speaker is chosen.
